data: Welcome to the AIandMe documentation! This guide will help you set up, integrate, and use AIandMe to keep your AI applications safe, accurate, and compliant.AIandMe is built for developers, AI teams, and businesses who care about trustworthy and ethical AI deployment. Whether you're in development, production, or post-deployment, our tools help you test, secure, and monitor your AI system.
data.what-is-aiandme#What is AIandMe?: AIandMe is a platform designed to test and secure AI systems at different stages. It consists of three key components:
data.1-contextual-penetration-testing-develop:
Catch vulnerabilities before they become a problem. AIandMe runs automated adversarial tests to identify security gaps in your AI system.ğŸ”¹ Synthetic Adversarial Prompts â€“ Generates test prompts to uncover weaknesses.
ğŸ”¹ LLM-as-a-Judge â€“ Uses an AI evaluator to detect vulnerabilities.
ğŸ”¹ Iterative Refinement â€“ Helps you fine-tune your model with real-world insights.
data.2ï¸-real-time-protection-production-phas:
Monitor and block risky AI behavior in real-time. AIandMe ensures your AI stays on track by preventing unwanted outputs.ğŸ”¹ Optimized LLM Evaluator â€“ Detects off-topic or unsafe prompts.
ğŸ”¹ Fine-Tuning Support â€“ Uses penetration test insights to improve security over time.
data.3ï¸-asynchronous-auditing-post-deploymen:
Keep your AI compliant and reliable even after deployment. AIandMe continuously audits logs and flags potential issues.ğŸ”¹ Scheduled Audits â€“ Scans user interactions for unexpected behavior.
ğŸ”¹ LLM-as-a-Judge â€“ Applies AI-based evaluation techniques for better insights.
ğŸ”¹ Expert Review â€“ Human experts analyze flagged issues to enhance security.
data.-why-use-aiandme#ğŸ”¹ Why Use AIandMe?:
1ï¸âƒ£ Minimize Risk â†’ Avoid compliance, legal, and reputation risks.
2ï¸âƒ£ Improve AI Continuously â†’ Keep refining your AI with real-world testing.
3ï¸âƒ£ Build User Trust â†’ Block harmful responses and ensure ethical AI interactions.
